title: How to Export Data from Facebook Your Ultimate Guide
extensions:
Learn how to export data from Facebook with our detailed tutorial. This video on Facebook data export covers exporting different types of data:
Facebook page insights
Facebook ads data
Facebook public data
And also your personal data on Facebook and Instagram

We explore both manual and automated methods to help you find the best way to export data from Facebook.

Check out the free dashboard templates mentioned in this video:
All-in-one social media dashboard https://l.rw.rw/allinone_socialmedia
All-in-one marketing overview dashboard https://l.rw.rw/allinone_marketing_overview
Facebook ads dashboard https://l.rw.rw/facebook-ads-report-template
PPC multichannel dashboard https://l.rw.rw/ppc-multichannel-looker-studio

Explore the entire collection with many other PPC templates available: https://l.rw.rw/dashboard_templates

Jump to the section that interests you the most:
00:00 Intro
00:22 Manual export of page insights
01:00 Automated way to export page data
01:32 Free dashboards for monitoring page metrics
02:45 Native method to export Facebook ads
03:51 Automated FB Ads reporting
04:19 Templates for monitoring Facebook Ads performance
05:35 Exporting Facebook public data
06:13 How to export personal data from Facebook?
06:58 Final words

title: How to Connect Facebook Ads to Looker Studio Google Data Studio in 2024
extensions:
Learn how to connect Facebook Ads to Google Data Studio in just a few minutes. Try a Looker Studio (Google Data Studio) connector that:
imports Facebook Ads data automatically, on a schedule you choose
lets you preview and transform your data, apply filters, sort, create custom formulas, and more
enables you to combine Facebook Ads data with imports from other PPC platforms, such as LinkedIn Ads, Google Ads, Instagram Ads, Bing Ads, and more.
